00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00123         public function get_countries()
00124         {
00125                 $query = "SELECT id, name FROM countries";
00126         $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00127         while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00128                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00129                         //$this->_countries[$key][] = $value;
00130                                 $this->_countries[$key][$row['id']] = $value;
00131         mysqli_free_result($result);
00132 
00133         return $this->_countries;
00134         }

00343 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345         public function get_has_many($x_field, $y_field)
00346         {
00347                 if($y_field == NULL)
00348                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field];
00349                 else
00350                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field];
00351         }
00352 
00353 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00355         public function init_has_many($x_field, $y_field)
00356         {
00357                 if($y_field == NULL)
00358                 {
00359                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field] = array();
00360                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field], "0");
00361                 }
00362                 else
00363                 {
00364                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field] = array();
00365                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field], "0");
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 //echo "INIT HAS MANY: " . $x_field . "<br>";
00369         }

00371 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00380         public function get_resource($resource_id) {
00381                 $query = "SELECT * FROM observatories WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
00382         $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00383         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00384                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00385         mysqli_free_result($result);
00386 
00387                 //OBSERVATORIES TABLE
00388                 foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00389                 {
00390                         //check if value is 0 since we use INT in the DB
00391                         if($value != '0')
00392                         {
00393                                 if($key == 'latitude')
00394                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00395                                 elseif($key == 'longitude')
00396                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00397                                 else
00398                                         $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = stripslashes($value);
00399                         }
00400                         else
00401                                 $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = '';
00402                 }
00403 
00404                 //SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00405                 $query = "SELECT id, name, email, institution FROM scientific_contacts, observatory_to_scientific_contacts " .
00406                 "WHERE scientific_contacts.id=observatory_to_scientific_contacts.scientific_contact_id " .
00407                 "AND observatory_to_scientific_contacts.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00408                 //DEBUG:
00409                 //echo $query;
00410                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00411                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00412                 {
00413                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00414                         {
00415                                 if ($key == 'id')
00416                                         $this->_hasMany["scientific_contacts"][] = $value;
00417                                 else
00418                                         $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_$key"][] = stripslashes($value);
00419                         }
00420                 }
00421                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00422 
00423                 //HIDDENFIELDS
00424                 $query = "SELECT * FROM hidden_fields WHERE hidden_fields.id=" . $resource_id;
00425                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00426                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00428                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00429                 {
00430                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00431                         if($key != 'id')
00432                                 $this->_hiddenFields[$key] = $value;
00433                 }
00434                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00435 
00436                 //RESEARCH AREAS
00437                 $query = "SELECT research_area_id as research_areas FROM observatory_to_research_areas " .
00438                 "WHERE observatory_to_research_areas.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00439                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00440                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00441                 {
00442                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00443                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00444                 }
00445                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00446 
00447                 //TARGETS
00448                 $query = "SELECT target_id as targets FROM observatory_to_targets " .
00449                 "WHERE observatory_to_targets.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00450                 //DEBUG:
00451                 //echo $query;
00452                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
00453                         or die("<br>Error: ".mysqli_error($this->_link));
00454                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00455                 {
00456                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00457                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00458 
00459                 }
00460                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00461 
00462                 //TELESCOPES
00463                 //SIMILAR QUERY TO SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00464                 $query = "SELECT * FROM telescopes, observatory_to_telescopes " .
00465                 "WHERE telescopes.id=observatory_to_telescopes.telescope_id " .
00466                 "AND observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00467                 //echo "TESTING INSTRUMENT QUERY: " . $query . "<br>";
00468 
00469                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00470 
00471                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00472                 {
00473                         //for each telescope of the requested obervatory
00474                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00475                         {
00477                                 if($value != '0')
00478                                 {
00479                                         if($key == 'id')
00480                                         {
00481                                                 //save telescope id in telescopes
00482                                                 //DEBUG
00483                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "<br>";
00484                                                 $this->_hasMany["telescopes"][] = $value;
00485                                                 //$this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value] = array();
00486 
00487                                                 //get all instruments for current telescope
00488                                                 $query_1 = "SELECT * FROM instruments, telescope_to_instruments " .
00489                                                 "WHERE instruments.id=telescope_to_instruments.instrument_id " .
00490                                                 "AND telescope_to_instruments.telescope_id=" . $value;
00491 
00492                                                 //DEBUG
00493                                                 //echo $query_1 . "<br>";
00494 
00495                                                 $result_1 = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query_1)
00496                                                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
00497 
00498                                                 while($row_1 = mysqli_fetch_array($result_1, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00499                                                 {
00500                                                         //for each instrument of the requested telescopes
00501                                                         foreach($row_1 as $i_key => $i_value)
00502                                                         {
00504                                                                 if($i_value != '0')
00505                                                                 {
00506                                                                         if($i_key == 'id')
00507                                                                         {
00508                                                                                 //DEBUG
00509                                                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "=> INSTRUMENT ID: " . $i_value . "<br>";
00510                                                                                 $this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value][] = $i_value;
00511                                                                         }
00512                                                                         else
00513                                                                                 $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = stripslashes($i_value);
00514 
00515                                                                         //echo $i_key . ": ";
00516                                                                         //echo $i_value . "<br>";
00517                                                                 }
00518                                                                 else
00519                                                                         $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = '';
00520                                                         }
00521                                                 }
00522                                                 mysqli_free_result($result_1);
00523                                         }
00524                                         else
00525                                                 $this->_telescopes[$key][] = stripslashes($value);
00526                                 }
00527                                 else
00528                                         $this->_telescopes[$key][] = '';
00529                         }
00530                 }
00531                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00532 
00533                 //ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
00534                 $query = "SELECT * FROM additional_information WHERE additional_information.id=" . $resource_id;
00535                 //DEBUG:
00536                 //echo $query;
00537                 $result = mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00538                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00539                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00540                 {
00541                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00542                         if($key != 'id')
00543                                 $this->_additionalInformation[$key] = stripslashes($value);
00544                 }
00545                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00546 
00547         }

00549 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00558         public function add_resource() {
00559                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00560         $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00561                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
00562                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
00563                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
00564                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
00565 
00566         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
00567                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
00568                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
00569                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
00570                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
00571 
00572                 $query = "INSERT INTO observatories (" .
00573                         "`id`,`name`,`founded`,`institution`,`web_address`,`address`,`zip_code`," .
00574                         "`city`,`country_id`,`phone`,`email`,`latitude`,`longitude`,`approx_position`," .
00575                         "`sealevel_m`,`precipitation`,`clear_nights`,`timezone`," .
00576                         "`observatory_status`," .
00577                         "`partner_observatories`, `creation_date`)" .
00578                         "VALUES (NULL,'" .
00579                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_name"]) . "','" .
00580                 $_POST["add_obs_founded"] . "','" .
00581                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "','" .
00582                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "','" .
00583                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "','" .
00584                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "','" .
00585                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "','" .
00586                 $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "','" .
00587                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "','" .
00588                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "','" .
00589                 addslashes($latitude_float) . "','" .
00590                 addslashes($longitude_float) . "','" .
00591                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "','" .
00592                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "','" .
00593                 $_POST["add_obs_precip_id"] . "','" .
00594                 $_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"] . "','" .
00595                 $_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"] . "','" .
00596                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "','" .
00597                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
00598                 "NOW())";
00599 
00600                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00601                 $status = array("errno" => mysqli_errno($this->_link),
00602                         "error" => mysqli_error($this->_link),
00603                         "res_id" => mysqli_insert_id($this->_link));
00604 
00605                 return $status;
00606         }
00607 
00608 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00619         public function update_resource($res_id) {
00620                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00621                 $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00622                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
00623                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
00624                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
00625                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
00626 
00627         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
00628                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
00629                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
00630                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
00631                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
00632 
00633                 $query = "UPDATE observatories SET " .
00634                         //We get another POST VAR for the name if EDIT
00635                         "name='" . addslashes($_POST["update_obs_name"]) . "'," .
00636                         "founded='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_founded"]) . "'," .
00637                         "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "'," .
00638                         "web_address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "'," .
00639                         "address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "'," .
00640                         "zip_code='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "'," .
00641                         "city='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "'," .
00642                         "country_id='" . $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "'," .
00643                         "phone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "'," .
00644                         "email='" .addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "'," .
00645                         "latitude='" . addslashes($latitude_float) . "'," .
00646                         "longitude='" . addslashes($longitude_float) . "'," .
00647                         "approx_position='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "'," .
00648                         "sealevel_m='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "'," .
00649                         "precipitation='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_precip_id"]) . "'," .
00650                         "clear_nights='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"]) . "'," .
00651                         "timezone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"]) . "'," .
00652                         "observatory_status='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "'," .
00653                         "partner_observatories='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
00654                         "modification_date=NOW() " .
00655                         "WHERE id=" . $res_id;
00656                 
00657                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00658                 $status = array("errno" => mysqli_errno($this->_link),
00659                         "error" => mysqli_error($this->_link),
00660                         "res_id" => $res_id);
00661 
00662                 return $status;
00663         }

00665 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00676         public function add_obs_keys($res_id, $action)
00677         {
00678                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00679                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_scientific_contacts & scientific_contacts)
00680                 //called VIA EDIT
00681                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
00682                         $this->update_sci_cons($res_id);
00683             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00684                 $this->add_sci_cons($res_id);
00685 
00686                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00687                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (hidden_fields)
00688                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
00689                 $this->update_hidden_fields($res_id);
00690             //called VIA ADD
00691             if ($action == "Add Entry")
00692                 $this->add_hidden_fields($res_id);
00693 
00694             //------------------------------------------------------------
00695             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_research_areas & research_areas)
00696             //called via EDIT
00697             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00698                 $this->delete_res_areas($res_id);
00699             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00700             $this->add_res_areas($res_id);
00701 
00702             //------------------------------------------------------------
00703             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_targets)
00704             //called via EDIT
00705             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00706                 $this->delete_targets($res_id);
00707             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00708             $this->add_targets($res_id);
00709 
00710                 //------------------------------------------------------------
00711             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatories_to_telescopes & telescopes)
00712             //called via EDIT
00713             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00714                         $this->delete_telescopes($res_id);
00715                 //called VIA ADD/EDIT
00716                 $this->add_telescopes($res_id);
00717 
00718             //------------------------------------------------------------
00719             //ADD/UPD/DEL (additional_information)
00720                 //called via EDIT
00721             if ($action == "Update Entry")
00722                 $this->update_add_info($res_id);
00723             //called VIA ADD
00724             if ($action == "Add Entry")
00725                 $this->add_add_info($res_id);
00726         }
00727 
00728 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00739         protected function update_sci_cons($res_id)
00740         {
00741                 $query = "DELETE FROM observatory_to_scientific_contacts WHERE " .
00742                        "observatory_id=" . $res_id;
00743             mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00744 
00745                 //PROOF IF THERE IS AN ARRAY!
00746                 if(is_array($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"]))
00747                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"] as $key => $sci_con_id)
00748                         {
00749                                 // check if a name is written in the line
00750                                 if ($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_name"][$key] != "")
00751                                 {
00752 
00753                                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_scientific_contacts VALUES (" . $res_id .
00754                                         "," . $sci_con_id . ")";
00755 
00756                                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00757                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00758                                                 print "<H4>Error updating observatory_to_scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00759                                         else
00760                                         {
00761                                                 $query = "UPDATE scientific_contacts SET " .
00762                                                 "name='". addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "'," .
00763                                                 "email='" . addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "'," .
00764                                                 "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["load_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "' " .
00765                                                 "WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
00766 
00767                                                 //DEBUG:
00768                                                 //echo $query;
00769 
00770                                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00771                                                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00772                                                 print "<H4>Error updating scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00773                                         }
00774                                 }
00775                                 else //DELETE empty row scientific contacts
00776                                 {
00777                                         $query = "DELETE FROM scientific_contacts WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
00778                                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00779                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00780                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00781                                 }
00782                         }
00783         }
00784 
00785 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00796         protected function add_sci_cons($res_id)
00797         {
00798                 //echo "DEBUG: SciConCount: " . count($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"]) . LF;
00799             foreach($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"] as $key => $name)
00800                 {
00801                         // check if a name is written in the line
00802                         if ($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key] != "")
00803                         {
00804                         $query = "INSERT INTO scientific_contacts VALUES (NULL,'" .
00805                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "','" .
00806                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "','" .
00807                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "')";
00808 
00809                     mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00810                             if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00811                                   print "<H4>Error inserting scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00812 
00813                             $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_scientific_contacts VALUES (" . $res_id .
00814                                      "," . mysqli_insert_id($this->_link) . ")";
00815 
00816                             mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00817                             if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00818                                   print "<H4>Error inserting observatory_to_scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
00819                         }
00820                 }
00821         }

00838                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_1"] . "','" .
00839                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_2"] . "','" .
00840                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_3"] . "','" .
00841                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_4"] . "','" .
00842                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_5"] . "','" .
00843                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_6"] . "','" .
00844                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_7"] . "','" .
00845                         $_POST["add_obs_hide_8"] . "','" .
00846                 $_POST["add_obs_hide_9"] . "')";
00847 
00848             mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00849             if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00850                 print "<H4>Error inserting hidden fields!</H4>" . LF;
00851    }

00865    {

00867                         "web_address='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_0"] . "'," .
00868                         "address='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_1"] . "'," .
00869                         "zip_code='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_2"] . "'," .
00870                         "city='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_3"] . "'," .
00871                         "phone='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_4"] . "'," .
00872                         "email='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_5"] . "'," .
00873                         "latitude='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_6"] . "'," .
00874                         "longitude='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_7"] . "'," .
00875                         "scientific_contacts='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_8"] . "'," .
00876                         "further_contacts='" . $_POST["add_obs_hide_9"] . "'" .
00877                         "WHERE id=" . $res_id;
00878 
00879                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00880                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00881                         print "<H4>Error updating hidden fields!</H4>" . LF;
00882    }

00902 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00913    protected function add_res_areas($res_id)
00914    {
00915                 //adding new areas
00916                 if(isset($_POST["add_res_are"]))
00917                 {
00918                         //DEBUG:
00919                         //echo "TESTING: " . $_POST["add_res_are"][1] . "<br>";
00920 
00921                         foreach($_POST["add_res_are"] as $new_res_are)
00922                         {
00923                                 //insert new area in research_areas
00925                                 $query = "INSERT INTO research_areas (" .
00926                                 "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
00927                                 addslashes($new_res_are) . "')";
00928 
00929                                 //DEBUG:
00930                                 //echo "TESTING QUERY: " . $query . "<br>";
00931 
00932                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00933                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00934                                 print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in research_areas!</H4>" . LF;
00935 
00936                                 //push new id into add_obs_res_are_ids
00937                                 array_push($_POST["add_obs_res_are_ids"], mysqli_insert_id($this->_link));
00938                         }
00939                 }
00940 
00941                 foreach ($_POST["add_obs_res_are_ids"] as $res_are_id)
00942             {
00943                         //check if res id is not empty and 100000 (other)
00944                 if(($res_are_id != '') && ($res_are_id != 100000))
00945                 {
00946                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_research_areas VALUES (" . $res_id .
00947                         "," . $res_are_id . ")";
00948 
00949                         //DEBUG:
00950                         //echo "TESTING: " . $query . "<br>";
00951 
00952                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
00953                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
00954                                 print "<H4>Error inserting in observatory_to_research_areas!</H4>" . LF;
00955                 }
00956             }
00957    }

00993                 if(isset($_POST["add_obs_target_ids"]))
00994                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_target_ids"] as $target_id)
00995                 {
00996                                 //if there is something choosen except first entry (explaination)
00997                         if ($target_id != '')
00998                                 {
00999                                 $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_targets VALUES (" . $res_id .
01000                                         "," . $target_id . ")";
01001 
01002                                 //DEBUG:
01003                                 //echo "TESTING: " . $query . "<br>";
01004 
01005                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
01006                                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01007                                         print "<H4>Error inserting in observatory_to_targets!</H4>" . LF;
01008                                 }
01009                 }
01010    }

01012 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01025         protected function delete_telescopes($res_id)
01026         {
01027                 //Telescopes
01028                 //PROOF IF THERE IS AN ARRAY!
01029                 if(isset($_POST["add_obs_telescope_ids"]))
01030                         //foreach ($_POST["add_obs_instrument_ids"] as $instrument_id)
01031                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_telescope_ids"] as $tele_key => $telescope_id)
01032                         {
01033                                 //check if an telescope type is choosen
01034                                 if (!empty($telescope_id))
01035                                 {
01036                                         //Instruments
01037                                         $query = "DELETE FROM instruments WHERE id IN (" .
01038                                                 "SELECT instrument_id from telescope_to_instruments WHERE telescope_id=" . $telescope_id .")";
01039 
01040                                         //DEBUG:
01041                                         //echo "INSTRUMENTS TABLE DELETE: " . $query . "<br>";
01042 
01043                                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01044                                                 or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01045                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01046                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01047 
01048                                         //Telescopes
01049                                         $query = "DELETE FROM telescopes WHERE id=" . $telescope_id;
01050 
01051                                         //DEBUG:
01052                                         //echo "TELESCOPES TABLE DELETE: " . $query . "<br>";
01053 
01054                                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01055                                                 or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01056                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01057                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01058                                 }
01059                         }
01060         }

01062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01076         protected function add_telescopes($res_id)
01077         {
01078                 //Telescopes
01079             foreach($_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"] as $tele_key => $tele_type_id)
01080                 {
01081                         //check if an telescope type is choosen
01082                         if (!empty($tele_type_id))
01083                         {
01084                                 //new Telescope Type (only one!)
01085                                 if(!empty($_POST["add_telescope_type"][$tele_key]))
01086                                 {
01087                                         $query = "INSERT INTO telescope_types (" .
01088                                         "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01089                                 addslashes($_POST["add_telescope_type"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01090 
01091                                 //DEBUG:
01092                                 //echo "TELESCOPE TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01093 
01094                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01095                                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01096                                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01097                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in telescope_types!</H4>" . LF;
01098 
01099                                 //overwrite POST var with new telescope type id
01100                                 $_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"][$tele_key] = mysqli_insert_id($this->_link);
01101                                 }
01102 
01103                                 //new Antenna Type (only one!)
01104                                 if(!empty($_POST["add_antenna_type"][$tele_key]))
01105                                 {
01106                                         $query = "INSERT INTO antenna_types (" .
01107                                         "`id`,`antenna_type`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01108                                 addslashes($_POST["add_antenna_type"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01109 
01110                                 //DEBUG:
01111                                 //echo "ANTENNA TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01112 
01113                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01114                                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01115                                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01116                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in antenna_types!</H4>" . LF;
01117 
01118                                 //overwrite POST var with new antenna type id
01119                                 $_POST["add_obs_antenna_type_id"][$tele_key] = mysqli_insert_id($this->_link);
01120                                 }
01121 
01122                                 //insert new telescope
01123                                 $query = "INSERT INTO telescopes VALUES (NULL,'" .
01124                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_telescope_name"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01125                        $_POST["add_obs_telescope_type_id"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01126                        $_POST["add_obs_telescope_elements"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01127                        $_POST["add_obs_diameter"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01128                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_focallength"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01129                        $_POST["add_obs_antenna_type_id"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01130                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_wavelength"][$tele_key]) . "','" .
01131                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_b"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01132                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_b_unit"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01133                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_e"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01134                                    $_POST["add_obs_wavelength_e_unit"][$tele_key] . "','" .
01135                                    addslashes($_POST["add_obs_telescope_comments"][$tele_key]) . "')";
01136 
01137                                 //DEBUG:
01138                                 //echo "TELESCOPES TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01139 
01140                     mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01141                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01142                             if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01143                                 print "<H4>Error inserting telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01144 
01145                                 //save telescope id for inserting instruments later
01146                                 $telescope_id = mysqli_insert_id($this->_link);
01147 
01148                             $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_telescopes VALUES (" . $res_id .
01149                                         "," . $telescope_id . ")";
01150                             //         "," . mysqli_insert_id($this->_link) . ")";
01151 
01152                             //DEBUG:
01153                             //echo "OBSERVATORY_TO_TELESCOPES TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01154 
01155                             mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01156                                 or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01157                             if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01158                                 print "<H4>Error inserting observatory_to_telescopes!</H4>" . LF;
01159 
01160                             //Instruments
01161                             foreach($_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key] as $instr_key => $instr_type_id)
01162                             {
01163                                 //DEBUG:
01164                                 //echo "INSTRUMENT TYPE ID: " . $instr_type_id . "<br>";
01165                                 //check if an instrument type is choosen
01166                                 if(!empty($instr_type_id))
01167                                 {
01168                                         //new Instrument Type (only one!)
01169                                         if(!empty($_POST["add_instrument_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]))
01170                                         {
01171                                                         $query = "INSERT INTO instrument_types (" .
01172                                                         "`id`,`name`)". " VALUES (NULL, '" .
01173                                                 addslashes($_POST["add_instrument_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "')";
01174 
01175                                                 //DEBUG:
01176                                                 //echo "INSTRUMENT TYPE: " . $query . "<br>";
01177 
01178                                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01179                                                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01180                                                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01181                                                         print "<H4>Error inserting new entry in instrument_types!</H4>" . LF;
01182 
01183                                                 //overwrite POST var with new instrument type id
01184                                                 $_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key][$instr_key] = mysqli_insert_id($this->_link);
01185                                         }
01186 
01187                                         //insert new instrument to telescope
01188                                         $query = "INSERT INTO instruments VALUES (NULL,'" .
01189                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_name"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01190                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_type_id"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01191                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_focal_position"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01192                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01193                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_b"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01194                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_b_unit"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01195                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_e"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01196                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_wavelength_e_unit"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01197                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_spatial_resolution"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01198                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_spectral_resolution"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01199                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_polarisation"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01200                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_field_of_view"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01201                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_max_frames"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01202                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_frame_size"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01203                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_max_exposure"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01204                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_min_exposure"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01205                                                         $_POST["add_obs_instrument_bw_chip"][$tele_key][$instr_key] . "','" .
01206                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_chip_type"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "','" .
01207                                                         addslashes($_POST["add_obs_instrument_comments"][$tele_key][$instr_key]) . "')";
01208 
01209                                                 //DEBUG:
01210                                                 //echo "INSTRUMENTS TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01211 
01212                                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01213                                         or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01214                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01215                                                 print "<H4>Error inserting instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01216 
01217                                                 $query = "INSERT INTO telescope_to_instruments VALUES (" . $telescope_id .
01218                                                 "," . mysqli_insert_id($this->_link) . ")";
01219 
01220                                                 //DEBUG:
01221                                         //echo "TELESCOPE_TO_INSTRUMENTS TABLE: " . $query . "<br>";
01222 
01223                                         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query)
01224                                                 or die("<br>Error: ". mysqli_error($this->_link));
01225                                         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01226                                                 print "<H4>Error inserting telescope_to_instruments!</H4>" . LF;
01227                                 }
01228                             }
01229 
01230                         }
01231                 }
01232         }
01233

01254                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_backend_desc"]) . "','" .
01255                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_research_com"]) . "','" .
01256                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_gen_com"]) . "')";

01259                 //echo "ADD info: " . $query . "<br>";
01260         mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
01261         if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01262                 print "<H4>Error inserting additional information!</H4>" . LF;

01287                         "general_comments='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_gen_com"]) . "'" .
01288                                 " WHERE id=" . $res_id;

01291                 //echo "UPDATE info: " . $query . "<br>";
01292                 mysqli_query($this->_link, $query);
01293                 if (mysqli_errno($this->_link) != 0)
01294                         print "<H4>Error updating additional information!</H4>" . LF;
01295         }

01297 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01298 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01299 // HELPER METHODS
01304         protected function gpsToFloat($prefix ,$degree, $minutes, $seconds, $cent)
01305         {
01306                 $float = 0.0;
01307 
01308         $float = abs($degree) + abs($minutes / 60) + abs($seconds / (60 * 60)) + abs($cent / (60 * 60 * 100));
01309 
01310                 if ($prefix == 'North')
01311                         $float *= 1;
01312                 else if ($prefix == 'South')
01313                         $float *= -1;
01314                 else if ($prefix == 'East')
01315                         $float *= 1;
01316                 else if ($prefix == 'West')
01317                         $float *= -1;
01320                 //echo "gpsToFloat-DEBUG: " . $prefix . " , " . $degree . LF;
01321                 //echo "Float: " . $float . LF;
01322 
01323         return $float;
01324         }
01325 
01326 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01331         protected function floatToGps($LATorLON, $float)
01332         {
01333                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["float"] = $float;
01334 
01335                 if ($LATorLON == "latitude")
01336                 {
01337                         if($float < 0)
01338                         $prefix = "South";
01339                 else
01340                         $prefix = "North";
01341         }
01342                 else if ($LATorLON == "longitude")
01343                 {
01344                         if($float < 0)
01345                         $prefix = "West";
01346                 else
01347                         $prefix = "East";
01348                 }
01349                 else
01350                 {
01351                         //$_POST["add_obs_" . $LATorLON] = array();
01353                 }
01354 
01355                 //echo "DEBUG-DB-float:" . $float;
01356 
01357         $float = abs($float);
01358         $deg = floor($float);
01359         $min = floor(($float - $deg) * 60);
01360         $sec = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60)) * 60 * 60 );
01361         $cent = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60) - ($sec/(60 * 60))) * 60 * 60 * 100 );
01362 
01363                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] = $deg;
01364                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["minutes"] = $min;
01365                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["seconds"] = $sec;
01366                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["cent"] = $cent;
01367                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["prefix"] = $prefix;
01368 
01369                 //DEBUG:
01370                 //echo "TESTING: " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] . "<br>";
01371 
01372                 //DEBUG:
01373                 //echo $LATorLON . "-floatToGps()-DEGUG: Float" . $float . LF;
01374                 //echo $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["prefix"] . " , " .  $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] . " , " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["minutes"]  . " , " .
01375                 //     $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["seconds"] . " , " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["cent"] . LF;
01376         }
01377 
01378 }
